ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Generates a simple Ternary Scatter chart in code
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Generates a [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#The%20Ternary%20Scatter%20Type.html']Ternary Scatter chart[/url] in code. The TernaryScatterRenderableSeries can be used to render an [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.XyzDataSeries%601.html']XyzDataSeries[/url].
The scatter chart uses the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/Point%20Marker%20API%20-%20BaseRenderableSeries.Pointmarker.html']PointMarker API[/url] to define the marker shape and size. This can be customized in code or you can create your own Point-Markers using our [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.PointMarkers.SpritePointMarker.html']SpritePointMarker[/url] or [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.PointMarkers.BasePointMarker.html']BasePointMarker[/url] type.
